reviews.review_msg: He is the best prof you can get for 400 level Econ course. He help student a lot during his office hour. His exam and marking are easy too!

480 is highly complementary to 435 and 494. It's very useful for doing research and preparing students for their thesis. It also covers topics such as regression discontinuity that are unseen in other courses. This course is unique because of its "potential outcome" approach and examine limitations of various methods. He is also nice and patient.
